short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get a daily word for the foreign language you are learning.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Learnfluent gives you a new word each day for whatever foreign language you are learning.

Languages Supported:
 - Spanish
 - French
 - German
 - Russian

Click the options button in the popup to change the language.
